The file with the environment that we provide might be an overkill. In case you have big troubles, just install the following libraries with 'conda install'

- bokeh=0.12.5
- plotly=2.2.2
- networkx=1.11
- wordcloud=1.3.1
- keras=2.1.2=py36_0
- networkx=1.11
- nltk=3.2.5
- numpy=1.12.1
- scikit-learn=0.19.1
- spacy=2.0.5
- tensorflow=1.1.0


and this one with 'pip install'
- wordcloud==1.3.1
